game.title: Eternal Realms
game.beginning: In a world where magic and technology coexist, players take on the role of a novice archaeologist tasked with uncovering the secrets of a long-lost civilization.
game.ending: After navigating treacherous landscapes, battling ancient creatures, and solving puzzles left behind by the civilization's inhabitants, the player discovers the location of the fabled "Eternal Realms," hidden realms that hold the key to unlocking new technologies and understanding the mysterious forces that shape the world.
game.synopsis: In a world where ancient magic and modern technology coexist in an uneasy harmony, players are tasked with uncovering the secrets of a long-lost civilization. As they delve deeper into the ruins, they'll encounter strange creatures, rival treasure hunters, and enigmatic artifacts that hold the key to unlocking new technologies and understanding the mysterious forces that shape the world.
